code: import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LineChart(){var data={labels:['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May'],datasets:[{label:'Sales for 2020(M)',data:[3,2,2,1,5],borderColor:['red'],backgroundColor:['red'],pointBackgroundColor:'red',pointBorderColor:'red'},{label:'Sales for 2019(M)',data:[1,3,2,2,3],borderColor:['blue'],backgroundColor:['blue'],pointBackgroundColor:'blue',pointBorderColor:'blue'}]};var options={title:{display:true,text:'Line Chart'},scales:{yAxes:[{ticks:{min:0,max:6,stepSize:1}}]}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:data,options:options});}export default LineChart;
